desc: Affordable, effortless style and elegance. Handmade in Massachusetts, designed for all the beautiful moments in life, no matter where the day brings you. Chappy Girls offers silver and gold jewelry, featuring beach, hobby, and animal charms, as well as elegant bracelets for daily wear.

layout.text: Wrap bracelets for everyday style and charm

Handmade in Massachusetts.
One size fits all (really!)
